titleStmt.title: Mr. John Mackenzyes Narrative of the siege of London-Derry a false libel, in defence of Dr. George Walker written by a friend in his absence.
titleStmt.author: Clark, Joseph Wilkinson.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
